Type of the privilege analysis policy.

Possible values:

  • G_DATABASE: Database wide privilege analysis

  • G_ROLE: Role privilege analysis

  • G_CONTEXT: Context privilege analysis

  • G_ROLE_AND_CONTEXT: Role and context privilege analysis
List of roles whose privileges to analyze if the privilege analysis type is G_ROLE or G_ROLE_AND_CONTEXT
Context condition if the privilege analysis type is G_CONTEXT or G_ROLE_AND_CONTEXT
